alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 10:54PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL BIG HORN... NORTHEASTERN YELLOWSTONE...MUSSELSHELL...NORTHERN ROSEBUD AND TREASURE COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM MDT... At 1053 PM MDT, the public reported a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Roundup to 8 miles south of Custer. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 60 mph. SOURCE...Public and radar indicated. Reports of small trees and powerlines down around Billings. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roundup, Forsyth, Hysham, Custer, Melstone, Rosebud, Musselshell, Pompeys Pillar, Bighorn, Ingomar, Cartersville, Vananda, Klein, and Hathaway. This advisory does not include the city of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Treasure
